email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a client looking to ship 12,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for this shipment?

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN TRADER, DWT 45,000, LOA 190m, for this shipment. The initial freight quote is USD 42.50 per metric tonne, CIF Shanghai. The laycan is from October 20 to October 25, 2023.

Let me know if this works for your client.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 42.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you review and possibly offer a more competitive rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rates and loading window in Newcastle?

Looking forward to your revised offer.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 40.75 per metric tonne, CIF Shanghai. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata. The loading window in Newcastle is 3 days, weather permitting.

Please let me know if this revised offer is acceptable.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for the revised offer. My client has agreed to the rate of USD 40.75 per metric tonne, CIF Shanghai. Please confirm the laycan and send over the recap for finalization.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Recap
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. The laycan remains October 20 to October 25, 2023. I will send over the recap shortly.

Best regards,
John
